body:
Comment 6: 
It appears so. There are many of them, and they all affect different sub-systems. It
could be as simple as "could not find directory where a particular dll is stored".

Why did you clear the environment in the first place? You are obviously worried that
some variables would affect your program execution. Why do you thin that clearing them
should NOT affect it then? So, since you don't know what the purpose of these is, just
don't touch them.

Alex
